actions.text: Referred to the House Committee on Foreign Affairs.

official_title: To authorize the Secretary of State to deny passports to noncustodial parents subject to State arrest warrants in cases of nonpayment of child support.

summary.text: Authorizes the Secretary of State to refuse, revoke, restrict, or limit a passport in cases where the applicant or passport holder is a noncustodial parent who is the subject of an outstanding State warrant of arrest for nonpayment of child support where the amount in controversy is not less than $10,000.

titles.title: To authorize the Secretary of State to deny passports to noncustodial parents subject to State arrest warrants in cases of nonpayment of child support.
